problems.title: Merge Sort - Sort an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers.
Sort the array using Merge Sort algorithm (Divide and Conquer approach).
Print the sorted array.

Merge Sort divides array into two halves, recursively sorts them, then merges the sorted halves.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
5 2 8 1 9

Sample Output
1 2 5 8 9

Explanation:
Array is sorted in ascending order using merge sort.
